channel.title: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!
channel.description:
Just had a poke about in the BMS.fgd file and to my astonishment I came across a line that mentions a npc rat
@NPCClass base(BaseNPC) studio("models/fauna/rat.mdl") = npc_rat : "Rat" []
This would have been great when crawling through vents... Residue processing springs to mind because of all the brown water.
I hope this npc would not be any danger to the player but I think this could have been quite good to have some rats in the game :slight_smile:

item.title: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!
item.dc:creator: Dr_Maxwell
item.description:
Forget about the rats, cockroaches, leeches, and wombats! We are cutting our losses and pulling out!

Read full topic
item.source: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!

item.title: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
That won’t… fix anything though… The FGD just tells Hammer what entities it can use, adding new things to it doesn’t magically make them work ingame, they still have to be coded and compiled into the client and server DLLs. There’s an FGD entry for an npc_zombie_grunt, that doesn’t mean it’s actually been implemented in the game.

Read full topic
item.source: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!

item.title: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!

item.description:
Dr. Karamazov:

Forget about the rats, cockroaches and leeches…what about the wombats?!

We need a new fgd now

I remember that mission but not that rat.

Funny mod!

Don’t know if mice have room in BM, you have already headcrabs, snarks and cockroaches…
there’s already a good amount of critters

item.title: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
I was thinking of a lab rat on one of those wheels that they run on… in a cage like you say or the old perspex rats maze.

anyway lab rat and wild rats both would be good additions and make complete sense for imersion only but not a high priority but an interesting find anyway in the fgd

I hope we get a few extra rooms in QE

Read full topic

item.description:

Cause no cages in a labo, no rats!

item.source: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!

item.title: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
warpedfreeman:

https://half-life.wikia.com/wiki/Earth_creatures

even in hl2 was going to be rats but was cut

Well after looking at that page there is plenty of opportunities to use them… It mentioned seeing the rats with scientists… An obvious combination and would go well in QE also.

Scientists always do experiments on rats…

There is plenty of scope for these little critters

So I hope they get put in eventually… It’s a distinct possibility

Read full topic

item.source: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!

item.title: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!
item.dc:creator: pRopaaNS
item.description:
I cant put my finger about seeing rat in HL, which I dont remember, but there were crockroaches whose could be found in some places, probably randomly generated. Just like leeches could be found in water, they gave game a speck of realism, but didnt really matter. About rats - I dunno where Ive seen them, but they were somewhere, maybe in one of HL mods. I just remember that stepping on them would squash them, in same way as stepping on crockroaches.

Read full topic
item.source: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!

item.title: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
I never new there was rats in the original to be honest thats why I was shocked to see it in the fgd but I think they sound quite promising as an addition.

I have not come across 1 game breaking bug… lot’s of small problems and some big glitch outs that are solved by reloading the level apart from that the game was by and large solid.

Read full topic
item.source: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!

But I want to see rats aswell, yes!

item.title: Forget about the leeches what about the rats!!!
item.dc:creator: Problematic_A-hole
item.description:
pRopaaNS:

Rats dont matter. Leeches dont matter. Gordons arms dont matter. Gordons legs dont matter.
Thats all. They simply arent important. Sorry, but I just grow tired by seeing new useless topics to be made. Although it`s still just my opinion.

I agree
we should focus on something actually important, such as fixes for game breaking bugs

Read full topic
